autoplay.description: Whether or not to play automatically.

path.description: Lottie resource address. Contains the JSON file addresses for the near end (in-package address) and the far end (network). Choose one or the other with djangoId.
path.description_zh: Lottie 资源地址。包含近端（包内地址）和远端（网络）的 JSON 文件地址。与 djangoId 二选一。

speed.description: Playback speed. Positive numbers are played in the positive direction, and negative numbers are played in the negative direction.
speed.description_zh: 播放速度。正数为正向播放，负数负向播放。

repeatCount.description: Number of cycles. If it's negative, it means an infinite number of times. If it is 0, it does not loop and plays it once. If it's 1, it loops once and plays twice.
repeatCount.description_zh: 循环次数。如果是负数表示无限次。如果是 0 表示不循环，播放一次。如果是 1 表示循环一次，播放两次。

autoReverse.description: Whether or not to play back automatically.

assetsPath.description: Resource address. "/" indicates that it is the root directory of the applet.
assetsPath.description_zh: 资源地址。"/" 表明是小程序根目录。

placeholder.description: Base map or downgrade map address. 1. Support local resources, example: '/image/lottie/lottie2_default.png'. Supports HTTP CDN addresses and near-end addresses. Mini Program scenarios do not support djangoId.
placeholder.description_zh: 兜底图或者降级图地址。1. 支持本地资源，案例：'/image/lottie/lottie2_default.png'。支持 http 的`cdn 地址、近端地址。小程序场景不支持 djangoId。

md5.description: MD5 validation for online resources. djangoId=https://b.zip。 You can use b.zip encryption to get the md5 value: md5="77c6c86fc89ba94cc0a9271b77ae77d2"
md5.description_zh: 在线资源的 md5 校验。djangoId=https://b.zip。可以使用 b.zip 加密 获取 md5 值md5="77c6c86fc89ba94cc0a9271b77ae77d2"

optimize.description: Demote. Downgrade means that in the case of low-end devices, Lottie will downgrade and display as placeholder. When optimize is true and placeholder is passed, only placeholder will be displayed on low-end devices, not Lottie. Low-end devices look like this: iOS: Less than or equal to iPhone6PAndroid: Memory capacity less than 3G
optimize.description_zh: 降级。降级是指如遇低端设备，Lottie 会降级展示为 placeholder。当 optimize 为 true ，并且传入了 placeholder 时，在低端设备上只会展示 placeholder，不展示 Lottie。低端设备如下所示：iOS ：小于等于 iPhone6PAndroid：内存容量小于 3G

onDataReady.description: Triggered when the data download + view creation is complete.
onDataReady.description_zh: 当数据下载+视图创建完成时触发。

onAnimationStart.description: Triggers at the start of the animation.

onAnimationEnd.description: Triggered at the end of the animation.

onAnimationRepeat.description: The animation ends once it is replayed.

onAnimationCancel.description: The animation is canceled. The callback is called when the service calls Cancel.
onAnimationCancel.description_zh: 动画取消。业务调用 Cancel 时回调。

onDataLoadReady.description: During parameterization, the data is prepared and the parameterized value is passed in by the service.
onDataLoadReady.description_zh: 参数化时，数据准备完成，等待业务传入参数化值。
